All functions

get_example_data()

Imports example data set for plotting

get_r2dii_technology_colours()

Get the predefined technology colors for a sector

plot_metareport_bubble()

Create a meta-report bubble chart

plot_metareport_distribution()

Create a meta-report distribution chart

plot_metareport_map()

Create a meta-report map chart

plot_metareport_pacta_sectors()

Create a small multiples bar chart with portfolio exposure to PACTA sectors

plot_metareport_pacta_sectors_mix()

Create a small multiples stacked bar chart with percentage investment in PACTA sectors

plot_metareport_security_types()

Create a bar chart with overview of asset types per investor type

plot_techmix()

Create a techmix chart in a ggplot object

plot_timeline()

Create a time line plot

plot_trajectory()

Create a trajectory alignment chart in a ggplot object

prepare_for_map_chart()

Prepares results data per asset type for map plot

prepare_for_metareport_bubble_chart()

Prepares results data per asset type for bubble chart

prepare_for_metareport_distribution_chart()

Prepares results data per asset type for distribution chart plot

prepare_for_metareport_pacta_sectors_mix_chart()

Prepares PACTA overview data for meta-report PACTA sectors mix chart

prepare_for_metareport_security_type_chart()

Prepares PACTA total_portfolio data for meta-report security type bar chart

prepare_for_pacta_sectors_chart()

Prepares PACTA overview data for meta-report PACTA sectors bar chart

prepare_for_techmix_chart()

Prepares pre-processed data for plotting a tech-mix chart

prepare_for_timeline()

Prepares sda_target-type data for timeline plot

prepare_for_trajectory_chart()

Prepares pre-processed data for plotting a trajectory chart

process_input_data()

Performs the initial processing on raw input data in banks' format

r2dii_palette_colours()

Get the 2DII colour palette

r2dii_sector_colours()

Get the 2DII sector colour palette

sda_target

Time series of emission factors

theme_2dii_ggplot()

Returns a custom 2dii ggplot theme
